website_summaries.verdict: Round peel-and-stick magnets for lightweight (60 to 90 grams) objects. 20 millimeter diameter by 2 millimeters thick.
pros: Great for mounting postcards and calendars to the fridge
Adhesive bonds to multiple surface types
Can hold up small metal household tools
cons: A number of magnets can detach from backing during shipping

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size manganets
customer_reviews.text: My manganets came nicely packaged in a bubble envelope. They work perfect for my purpose which is stick them on the back of save the date postcards about 4x5. I have taken a picture of how big the mangents are compared to a quarter and a penny.
customer_reviews.author: bertha30g

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure if these magnets would be perfect for what I needed them for
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if these magnets would be perfect for what I needed them for, but they absolutely were! I bought them to put on the backside of the dry-erase calendar that I wanted to put on my refrigerator. It didn't come with magnets as it is intended to be wall-mounted, but I wondered if I would be able to find magnets strong enough to do the job. I used the entire block that I received – which was probably overkill - but they definitely worked!
customer_reviews.author: C. Michaels

customer_reviews.title: hold up well
customer_reviews.text: i bought the square version because that is what everyone was talking about in the reviews. im glad i did. not that anything might be wrong with the round ones, idk, but the square are great. i made this little reward game for my students and in the past i have had problems with magnets not holding well through laminate and falling off. not with these. i can even shake it and nothing moves. im very happy and will purchase more for my next projects.
customer_reviews.author: secretdevil 1987

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for classroom use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to make signs for my classroom. They do an amazing job of holding up laminated oak tag labels. This product is much stronger than other types of magnetic tape that I have bought through office supply stores. I also like that these are precut squares. You can use as many or as few as you need without waste. I would definitely recommend and will reorder when needed!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: These magnets are great!
customer_reviews.text: These magnets can be used as individual magnets or used as multiple. The cuts are very good on the magnets so they come apart fairly easily. The paper backing isn't cute through so getting them individually pulled off that is a little harder, but definitely still not hard. I used these to hold up laminated cut out sheets of paper on my white board. They are strong, I've had no problems with them. I haven't tested anything heavier but I'm sure with enough magnets these would hold up some heavy items. I will buy these again when I need more. Each magnet is .75''x.75".
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Good magnetic strength and adhesive power
customer_reviews.text: I cut a small triangle out for a heavy steel sharpener. It adhered well to the surface and has performed well in keeping the sharpener magnetically attached to the metal pegboard.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse BexTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: LOT of magnet ! Beware when removing them from the envelope though !
customer_reviews.text: You get LOT of magnet in this set, which is nice. However, beware when removing them from the envelope though, as it's easy to get those two magnet sheet to touch each others, and then ALL your magnets will start to attract each others and it will be a big mess to deal with afterward. Other than this issue, they are useful. Especially for my project to help fix some "light spots" in a "black out light" curtains that were a bit loose on their sides. And yes, I was nicely surprised to see that the self adhesive side of those magnets will actually stick to the fabric of those curtain.
customer_reviews.author: Orcatrainer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bough these to help our preschooler match his uppercase and lower case letters. We cut index cards in half and glued cute illustrations to each one and added the magnets to the back. We use a magnetic dry erase board to use these creations on. Magnets are the perfect strength and small enough for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Leenheer

customer_reviews.title: Handy magnets for hanging things around the house
customer_reviews.text: These little magnets met my expectations. I was looking for a way to hang/suspend a small object (a little battery powered LED light) in various places. The LED has a metal strip and came with one adhesive magnet strip, but I wanted to move the light around. These squares allowed me to put magnetic hangers around the house. My only issue was that the magnets tend to “jump” off the adhesive backing sheet if you make an opening by removing one or more. The magnets tend to try to move on the sheet by attraction to other nearby magnets. But it is no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Works great for small projects
customer_reviews.text: These are strong magnet squares with an adhesive backing. Works great for small projects, refrigerator crafts, and school/office whiteboards. So far everything I put these on has been staying put! They're not thin and flimsy; they're a little thicker so if you put them on paper, there's a little gap between the whiteboard and paper (but I don't mind). But that's why they're "heavy duty".
customer_reviews.author: D P

customer_reviews.title: Works well on Perler(Hama) Bead Projects
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these on the back of my projects to make them into magnets and honestly I've never used something with such ease before. You have to make sure you press them on the back quite hard before placing them where u want them to go, but on Perler Bead(hama bead) projects they're wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr Nyx

customer_reviews.title: They are good magnets
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be like the flimsy sheet magnets I had as a kid, but these are pretty great. The adhesion that isn't magnetic is ok, but the magnet really holds to our fridge well. We tried hot glue to more-firmly attach to some baked clay ornament things, and that didn't go super well, but the given adhesive works well for things like paper pads and other easy to glue to surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Karl P. Henselin

customer_reviews.title: Fridge magnet frenzy!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use on paper items, needles to say. Turned a few stickers into fridge magnets. Also turned an old flower hair clip into a fridge magnet that holds a pen on there for calendar use. Attempt to alter an old deadpool figure into a fridge magnet & ended up having to hot glue the magnet onto it because it kept falling off. No further issues. Multiple uses, mostly fridge stuff currently. Plenty of spares for when something doesn't work out. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make a spice section on the side of my fridge so they are easier to access and leave more room in my cupboard. You literally just peel off the magnet and stick them to whatever object (in my case it was glass spice bottles from Trader Joe’s). Easy to use for sure!
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is intended for!
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are very good for their intended purpose - sticking to items that then can be fastened to anything magnetic like refrigerators, magnetic bulletin boards, etc. The product seems to have more magnetic adhesion/holding power than cheaper versions. The price was right, considering how many individual magnet squares are included.
customer_reviews.author: JWT

customer_reviews.title: Easy, strong magnets!
customer_reviews.text: Easy as pie to use. Just peel off, stick to whatever item you are trying to magnetize, and then poop onto the fridge. No wait time, no peeling off, nothing. I used 3 so my stuff is super secure but my item was big enough to fit three of these squares on to it. I suspect thought that 1 would have been sufficient. These are not easy to remove or cut through, just FYI if you were thinking of doing so.
customer_reviews.author: jaded928

customer_reviews.title: Tough, effective, and easy
customer_reviews.text: I needed vinyl magnets that were stronger than what I'd found at craft stores. This is the ideal product. My project was magnetic bumper stickers for my car that wouldn't ruin the paint or curl up in the heat. This product filled the bill and the tiny individual squares are perfect for odd sized stickers. If I have any complaint, it's that the adhesive is so strong I immediately glued an entire strip to my arm. Handle with care or use your forward to hold pins, needles, bolts, pie pans, car parts...
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M. Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Small magnet... Big strength...
customer_reviews.text: This magnet set was purchased to place on the back of small metal tins to hone my spices on my refrigerator. Some of the metal tins are quite heavy and I wasn’t sure if one magnet in the center would hold, but it absolutely did without a problem. The adhesive backing is extremely strong and the magnet itself is also very strong. I have plenty left over from many other uses...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R Amiano

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Needed these to stick my dry erase calendar to our fridge. The back of my dry erase board kindve has a weird..back. its uneven so I ended up having to hot glue the magnets on. But I used like 10 magnets and it works
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Great magnets!
customer_reviews.text: These magnetics arrived all enacted. It worked perfectly on wood chips I created for a Christmas Countdown Tree. I didn’t realize the magnet has a strong connection on certain positions and I was trying to reposition it but the adhesive on it is very strong! So, just be sure wherever you place it, leave it alone! Great magnets for the price!
customer_reviews.author: CraftyQiao

customer_reviews.title: Easy to peel and use also conveniently cut
customer_reviews.text: The magnet square arrived on time and were package okay. But adhesive didn't hold up well for me. Maybe because it's Summer season and it's really hot and items don't stick well during a heat wave. The company is great but unfortunately the magnets didn't work out for DIY project.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Great magnets!!
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are awesome! Bought these after the first ones I bought from the craft store weren’t strong enough. I made a chore chart for my kids and the other magnets I bought wouldn’t hold on through the laminated chart. These ones hold GREAT! The backs are super sticky too!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Kriegel

customer_reviews.title: A nice solution to keeping track of upcoming events without having ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these to use on the back of a desk top calendar and put it on my fridge. A nice solution to keeping track of upcoming events without having to right really small on the typical yearly calendars. I ended up using these for lots of other things too, pretty much all for my fridge. Since they can be broken up into smaller pieces they are easy to use on pictures and invitations, birth announcements, etc. and stick them right on the fridge without a bulky magnet pinning it down and blocking part of the front.
customer_reviews.author: audrey cech

customer_reviews.title: A handy accessories organizing helper.
customer_reviews.text: I use them to organize my desktop accessories, you can actually stick the magnets on most of small and lightweight items and stick them to the wall, window, mirror, bedside, basically anything. Very easy to use, the adhesion is pretty good, for my A/C remote, I need at least two pieces for the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle.c

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: while this might work for others. I had wanted thin magnets to adhere to the back of my eyeshadows. I have a lot to de-pot and put in an empty magnetic palette. I'll try something else. If you want thick magnets this is perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Samira

customer_reviews.title: I used these on thin wood picture frames worked well
customer_reviews.text: I used these on thin light weight craft picture frames that I made for people at Christmas. I wanted them to be able to hang the frame of the refrigerator or other metal surface. Overall they worked very well however a couple people told me that the magnet came off after a couple months but most have told me they are holding strong to the frame. The glue on them seems to be pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: eagletalon2016

customer_reviews.title: Good for price, but difficult to store
customer_reviews.text: I bought these little magnets to stick to notepads (which we use as grocery list) so they can stay on the fridge. The magnets work great, the adhesive is strong and has lasted thus far. The only thing that can be bothersome is the storage, they come in two very inconvenient sheets of paper that unless you keep them flat, the magnets will adhere if folded. Other than that good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are super easy to use and are fairly strong too. I used to get these types of magnets from another vendor but when they stopped selling them, I needed a replacement. This brand works just as well, if not better! They are cut very well (but the paper is not) and they are a decent size. I use them as mini canvases for drawings and they hold up well. They are very strong when placed on my whiteboard, yet they are soft enough to be cut into cute shapes! Would recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Madhu

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, effective, and easy to use.  Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very useful, effective, and easy to use. Work well on dry erase boards. However, they are very smooth -- which is good, so they don't scratch the dry erase board. But the smoothness also means they tend to slide easily with gravity, so you might end up using more than what you anticipated. But there are plenty of them in this set, and I'm happy to recommend them to you.
customer_reviews.author: Mateo_MacGyver

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets! Wish the sticky side were a little stickier.
customer_reviews.text: These are great magnets! I use them to hang lightweight picture frames in my office as my walls are metal. They work very well. The only area for improvement I'd suggest is to make the sticky side a little more sticky. It has come off a few of my picture frames and I've had to re-stick it on there or replace it with a different one. To remedy this, I suppose someone could also add some super glue when placing the magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets but adhesive might not be enough
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness for these. I have a dry erase board on the fridge along with a wire basket for markers. I swear every time I'd walk past the basket I would knock it off. Rather than get another container for the markers I thought I'd give these a try. I've only knocked the basket off once since adding 6 small squares and it was the adhesive that failed! The magnets stayed on the fridge! It's still much better than before so I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Greif

customer_reviews.title: Very weak magnets
customer_reviews.text: These work well if what you need them for is very lightweight. They are not very strong. We used them to hang up fish cutouts on our cruise ship door. Each time the door closed the magnets would slide down the door. We had to use two or three for each cut out just to get them strong enough to stay on the door.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Rotthoff

customer_reviews.title: they hold a lot better than anything else
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these to use with my z palette. I stick these on the bottom of my makeup pans... they hold a lot better than anything else. So far I have had no issues with the sticky part not holding my makeup pans. Works great for what I need and will buy again !!
customer_reviews.author: CMiles1985

customer_reviews.title: Good magnets
customer_reviews.text: I buy these yearly to use in my classroom. I use them to hang pocket charts and anchor charts in my room. They are great quality. They hold a good amount of weight. I don’t have to use too many to hang things up. Also get a decent amount in the package.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Odd application
customer_reviews.text: The plastic doors on my 2 alarm key pads would no longer stay closed. These dot magnets are cutable with shears to fit the open space on the panel then install another on door. BINGO. DOOR STAYS CLOSED
customer_reviews.author: MSC

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I’ve bought these a couple times now and exactly what I need. As a teacher they come in handy for many projects. Making my own magnets, magnet schedule cards on white board, or magnetic trackers for class. Use them often, always work and never disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Helped with Depot makeup
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when I decided to depot my makeup. They are so easy to use. The adhesive easily stick to the pan. If I made a mistake, I could easily remove the magnet from the pan. The adhesive will still sticky so I could stick it to another pan. I will buy more when I depot more makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Trini Tovar

customer_reviews.title: Actually really strong
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used these to make sea glass magnets for family for Christmas. We tried the others and they wouldn’t hold with the glass. These are super strong. I was pleasantly surprised. You could easily cut them as well.
customer_reviews.author: mix2grey

customer_reviews.title: Turned bookends into towel holders!
customer_reviews.text: I affixed these strong magnets to the bottoms of two bookends, then placed the bookends on top of my staked dryer. the magnets are strong enough to hold the towels in place - even when stacked 3 high! very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Trish B

customer_reviews.title: Best magnets ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool!!!! I used these to create my own refrigerator magnet Save the Dates and they EASILY stuck to the wood surface I needed them to stick to, they do not fall off, they strongly magnet to the fridge, they’re perfectly flat enough to be inconspicuous in my invitations. Probably going to buy again for more fun projects.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Sticks well, holds well
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. I wanted to stick my eyeshadows to a magnet board on the wall. These hold really well and the adhesive is nice and strong; good enough for minorly uneven surfaces. Zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Katie W

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these to put props on a dry erase board for my job and they are great quality. They were super easy to put on and have lasted a long time. They are heavier than expected, but it doesn’t seem to matter.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty and work wonderfully! Affordably priced too! I used them to attach a deflector to my brand new AC to avoid using sticky tape. I was amazed at how powerful they are. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: shoppityshop

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine For My Requirements
customer_reviews.text: Got these to secure a kitchen cabinet door that wouldn't secure when attempt to close. The adhesive is string enough to hold the two magnets in place and the magnetic "attraction" is strong enough to secure the door closed. Works fine for what I got them for. Now I just have a whole bunch for future use!
customer_reviews.author: OldnAchy

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing little metal things
customer_reviews.text: I love these magnets! I put some on the inside of the spice cabinet and was able to attach all my metal tins to the magnets making an organized cabinet easier. It might take two or three squares but they hold well.
customer_reviews.author: Jans45

customer_reviews.title: Works great, better than the others I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: Adhesion and strong magnetism is great, better than the others I've tried on here. This is definitely functional as described.
customer_reviews.author: ericsysmin

customer_reviews.title: Poor magnetic adhesion.
customer_reviews.text: Fine for minor and thin surfaces but not anything that might be heavier, hard to describe but quite disappointed. Thrown away!
customer_reviews.author: WelshRugbyMan

customer_reviews.title: Not strong
customer_reviews.text: Not good for what I wanted them for and not strong enough... Wasted all of them and all my money and time...
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopping

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: These are a good size and relatively strong. Bought them to adhere teaching materials to a small magnetic whiteboard, and they serve well for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A.

customer_reviews.title: work well
customer_reviews.text: The magnet squares are a little smaller than I was expecting but they are strong for this type of magnet. I used them to stick my remotes to the blue-ray player so I do not misplace them. The best part is that these magnets do stick to each other so I can also have the remotes stick to each other when they are in use. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with these, I bought them to stick to the bottom of some pallet pans for my watercolors. I had to use some E6000 glue to attach the magnets to the pans and that did the trick. Some still fall off because of the strength of the magnet :D
customer_reviews.author: K Wu

customer_reviews.title: Presentation
customer_reviews.text: I guess I don’t like the presentation the way they come in, all in one layer and they get messed up. I think they’re pretty good just not for what I needed them for.
customer_reviews.author: GizzieGirl

customer_reviews.title: 3/4” squares
customer_reviews.text: The squares are exactly 3/4” square. I’m slightly disappointed because I thought they were an inch square. Still nice magnets. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: S.W.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The round ones are terrible! The adhesive doesn’t stay even given 48 hours to cure. The magnet itself is so weak. Extremely disappointed in these magnets.
customer_reviews.author: AverieAgility

customer_reviews.title: Great magnets fir diy
customer_reviews.text: I made a magnetic makeup board, and these made it super easy for the makeup. They are small but strong. They are easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Another genius invention
customer_reviews.text: These magnets stick and stick well! I couldn't find anything like them locally, and just love these.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Lange

customer_reviews.title: Didn't accomplish my objective but will be worth having anywhay
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because Ineeded a way to hold drawers together that were not leveled when installed in my closet - but they don't hold together I will get something metal to make them work but they will be useful elsewhere - I will use in the galley of airplane. As a FA we need to put up papers to refer to all the time - I've been carrying rolls of tape for 50 years and these will be a huge upgrade
customer_reviews.author: Consolegal

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are too weak.. they barely stick to each other which is what I needed them for... returning
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C

customer_reviews.title: Super Strong!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was not expecting these to be super strength! I am a teacher, and bought these to put on the back of sight words for my magnetic word wall. These things are industrial strength! Way more powerful that what my needs were, but that made me pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I brought these to add to a already magnetic basket for my vitamins. I just wanted the extra security just incase my vitamins were too much for the basket. I added 5 magnets to the basket and the extra umph was prefect
customer_reviews.author: Angela Goines

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to make movable things for my whiteboard. Sticks to laminate extremely well! Make sure you know where you want to place them before you Stick them Down because they will not budge.
customer_reviews.author: cpaul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pressed cardstock onto sticky side. Used to number a magnetic whiteboard calendar so we weren't constantly erasing and renumbering. Worked great and I still have 35 for another project later....if there is one.
customer_reviews.author: moooviebuff

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: So convenient to have. I put mine on the back of my artwork. I paint record albums and canvas boards, then hang in my work file cabinet. Works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: work well but theyre very thick
customer_reviews.text: i got these to use with my magnetic eyeshadow palette and these are very thick. they work for what im using them for but i would not recommend them to anyone using them with a magnetic palette
customer_reviews.author: Fern

customer_reviews.title: great adhesive magnets
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for small objects. I was prepared to use super glue for some heavier objects, but was surprised to find that it's 3M adhesive and no extra glue was necessary. Purchased a few other items from "House Again" and they make/sell excellent products.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: they work but they're big
customer_reviews.text: they're very magnetic but much bigger than i expected them to be and thicker
customer_reviews.author: Himant ramphul

customer_reviews.title: Try It, I Assure You You’ll Find Uses For It
customer_reviews.text: These magnetic strips have good adhesion, easy to use & they’re strong. I intentionally bought this for attaching my stylus pen to my iphone case & for me it works perfectly; though I did cut it to size. Hung a tall tin box housing my pens, scissors, ruler & other supplies with these strips & it works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Kanani

customer_reviews.title: Great magnets!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best magnets ever! I always use them at school and have had trouble with other makers. These magnets are strong and stick to what I put them on!
customer_reviews.author: Worldpoints

customer_reviews.title: I love these & will order again.
customer_reviews.text: I love these & will order again. I've used them for making magnets with the kids with heavy salt dough & shopping lists for the fridge. They are great & have a strong magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for teachers
customer_reviews.text: I'm a teacher, so I use these for everything. I've ordered them over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Powell's Groovy Pad

customer_reviews.title: Simply Magnetic!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to put small pots of makeup into an empty palette to combine them all in one place. I wish they were a little thinner but that's not something you can see via a picture. They work for what I need!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Tutt

customer_reviews.title: Handy magnets
customer_reviews.text: These are a great size which makes them handy to have around the house
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Moore

customer_reviews.title: Fairly strong magnets can hold small containers
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are fairly strong. I created a desk set with an ikea magnetic knife strip and have been using these magnets on the backs of small containers for my office supplies to keep my desk clutter free.
customer_reviews.author: DC =c )~

customer_reviews.title: works on fabric
customer_reviews.text: I used the adhesive magnets to attach some appliqued fabric to an antique metal cake pan. It worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Loki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my classroom.
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive on these magnets could be a little stronger but overall they work for what I need them for and I could always hot glue if needed. I have cut some in half for smaller projects with no problems. Used to magnet things onto my whiteboard at school.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Great adhesion and strong magnet. Very easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia K.

customer_reviews.title: cant even hold pens
customer_reviews.text: Can barely hold anything. Theyre useless to me. Dont buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherly F.

customer_reviews.title: Cutable and light holding crafts.
customer_reviews.text: Not powerful but you can cut them and they are fine for light holding.
customer_reviews.author: Garage Rat

customer_reviews.title: Teachers best friend!
customer_reviews.text: I love these magnet dots! I’m a teacher and have been trying to make more hands-on activities for my students. These are great and seem like they will last longer than the Velcro dots I typically use. I put them in the back of laminated materials and use inexpensive cookie sheets with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Stray

customer_reviews.title: Cheapy Made
customer_reviews.text: Weak magnet pull. Barely held anything. Adhesive was peeling off. Put it in the trash and bought something better.
customer_reviews.author: Cashe

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I used these magnets for all my refrigerator magnet projects. They work great and not only adhere to the project well, but also adhere to the refrigerator really good. I will definitely buy these again whenever I need to replenish my stock.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer KatPo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful magnet squares
customer_reviews.text: These little magnet squares are really great!! These will solve all mounting issues of any camera. I am so happy with these that I would highly recommend these for camera lovers and for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: RBG

customer_reviews.title: The most practical thing I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: SO USEFUL OMG. Every day I find another use for it. I'm so glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Great quality magnets with plenty of stick
customer_reviews.text: Great quality magnets with plenty of stick! They are a bit thicker than the standard craft magnet, so I'm not sure about the "flexible" part of the name, but they worked well for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Parcel

customer_reviews.title: too weak
customer_reviews.text: Had hoped they would be stronger magnets for the application I wanted to use them in. Probably not the product, but rather my idea for use.
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive is horrible
customer_reviews.text: We use these for homeschooling purposes and while they are thick and fairly easy to use, the adhesion on these is horrible. We only have attempted to use them to hold up paper and cardstock and they don't hold very long or in some cases at all. The magnet itself is pretty good though, but they definitely need to do something about the adhesion.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kitchen magnet crafting
customer_reviews.text: Super light weight and great value for money. I buy these so I can stick little Knick knacks on them to turn into kitchen magnets. These hold a decent amount and are flexible enough to cut into smaller sizes.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: These are surprisingly strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: These were great magnets and surprisingly strong. I used them to magnetize scrabble tiles to my fridge. This was really easy to do since they were pre-cut!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Not to bright
customer_reviews.text: Good item didn’t see it delivered finally found it in between the 2 front doors so yes it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: roger

customer_reviews.title: Great for tiny magnet needs.
customer_reviews.text: My dresser drawers would keep opening. So I bought these little adhesive magnets, put them on the inside of the drawers and it works like perfect. The adhesive is strong, and its a lot of magnets. Kewl stuff
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnets that don't hold.
customer_reviews.text: These magnets don't hold a 3 ounce hook. I used 4 sqhares of these magnets to hold a 3 ounce hook and it didn't work. Don't waste your $$$$$.
customer_reviews.author: May Lepak

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Bought them to help hang a very small rod that was very light and it fell right off and took paint off my wall
customer_reviews.author: Ad

customer_reviews.title: The magnets don't feel super strong, but I was able to put 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: A few of them were not stuck to the backing when they arrived, but were still sticky and i was able to use them. The magnets don't feel super strong, but I was able to put 4 of them on a LED light and hold it up, so no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Hermish

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use these for small glasswork magnets that I make. Works good for these. Do not know how well it would hold a heavier item.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for art projects!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for what I needed it for. I cut each square into 4 mini squares and placed them on some watercolor pans to stick them into a tin box. Worked great! And there's a lot to work with for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Leirda

customer_reviews.title: As you would expect sticker magnets to work
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Magnets aren’t that strong but that’s to be expected for small pieces. We used them to make magnets and they work great for our needs
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good find!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for placing on the back of star chart to put on front of stainless refridgerator that is not magnetic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work well
customer_reviews.text: They work good. Wish there were some skinnier magnets, like really thin.
customer_reviews.author: Lanchors

customer_reviews.title: Alright purchase, not for any more weight then a card
customer_reviews.text: Thought they would me stronger to hold up a little weight! Needed about 40 to hold up a white board on the fridge and 10 for a picture frame. Work great for cards and invitations.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkie

customer_reviews.title: Wish the sticky side was stronger.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to hang a calendar on my fridge. Magnets works great but the adhesive isn’t very strong and after a couple days my calendar fell off the fridge with the magnets still attached to the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

product_meta.title: Flexible Magnet Dots with Adhesive by House Again – Perfect for Crafts & DIY Projects, Hanging & Organizing Light Objects at Home Office or Warehouse, 70Pcs
feature_bullets: 🎄Just Peel and stick, within seconds, you can turn any small object into a magnet! From making refrigerator magnets to holding pictures to organizing ferrous tools, you may be surprised at the uses you find for them.

🎄Each disc can hold up to 60-90 grams. Our rubber magnets are designed to hold light objects and as a supporting material for handcraft and DIY projects. The actual hold weight is related to the contact area or ferromagnetic properties level. If you want stronger magnetic force, we recommend customers to buy more expensive heavy duty magnets such as neodymium magnets.

🎄Premium adhesives are made for sticking quickly and firmly. Ideal for clean, smooth and uniform surfaces made of paper, wood, stainless steel, painted steel, aluminum, glass, and rigid plastics. Be careful to apply enough pressure when sticking it to an object. Make sure the surfaces is adhesive friendly: flat, clean and dy.
🎄VERSATILE: This pre-cut magnet won’t curl and keep peeling off like magnetic rolls. Per your needs, you can use it as magnetic squares, magnetic strips or magnetic sheets.
【WHAT YOU GET】70 Pcs Round Flexible Magnet with Adhesive. And friendly customer service, contact us immediately if you have any issues with your purchase. All issues will be solved within 24 hours.
